作為雙魚男都係得唔到一個人就好憎佢
但唔知係咪之前比人hurt過
搞到見返個個人都會照憎佢唔會心痛

我（雙魚女）被獅子男搞到絕望提分手
我只係因為鍾意先成日搵你，做主動都唔欣賞我
出去發完夢，全日打得一個電話畀佢，竟然第一句就話我chur佢
之後重講咩要五十五十，話要私人空間
少少野捉我嚟鬧明明我咩都就晒佢
頂咗好耐忍唔住講出嚟，冷戰咗兩個禮拜
心軟原諒佢先兩日，又因為少少事追住我鬧
唉....激到我又暈又想嘔
無見差不多成個月，畀晒機會佢，佢屋企出事我都無唔理佢，終於佢嚟搵我，但係我已經feel到自己個心死咗，無咗以前鍾意佢嘅感覺喇
其實近期有人追我，但我分得好開，我無接受果個人，因為我係度等佢改，等佢搵我，但係死咗心喇，見返面都唔係以前嘅感覺，始終都係散咗

依家每次chur完佢 都會再真誠表白 然後佢又再同我講idk
我有試過冷靜唔搵佢一兩日 但係好驚佢會搵過個 之後我又再chur咗佢

My friend Sam is a Pisces whereas his girlfriend is a Virgo. He's faithful to her and would never cheat on her. When he broke up with his ex, he was driven over the edge. Even when a stranger talked to him, there was an edge of hostility to his voice. But as soon as he had a new relationship target it took the edge of his emotional upset. He's a swimming champion who easily outshines me in any swimming styles. He's tall and lean who definitely has the edge over lots of swimmers. Recently, he and his current girlfriend dined in Peninsula Hotel which is midway between his house and the shopping centre. He stood in line outside the restaurant for an hour. The line was so huge that it stretched from the counter through the lobby area and out the main entrance of the hotel. A stout man tried to cut in line but was caught lol. I popped over to his place and saw them yesterday. The bus queue for his residential estate is so big stretching down the road to the furthest mini bus stop. I queued for forty minutes before three shuttle buses came along at once. Meanwhile, some people mistook this long queue for the queue for other places. A couple came up to me and asked "Are you in the queue for Cluny Park?" to make sure that it's the right queue. A stout man pushed in in the middle of the queue but people ignored it. Later a slim guy jumped the queue. The lady behind him said "Excuse me. The end of the line is back there." A woman stood beside a guy who was midway through the queue. While pretending to look at her phone, she edged furtively behind him who didn't realise she was there. Some people might have noticed it but ignored it. When I saw Sam he seemed on edge. It turns out he has an interview tomorrow. Never has he felt so on edge before an interview.
